<a id="class_CSharpScript"></a>

# CSharpScript

**Inherits:** [Script](class_script.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A script implemented in the C# programming language, saved with the ``.cs`` extension (Mono-enabled builds only).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class represents a C# script. It is the C# equivalent of the [GDScript](class_gdscript.md) class and is only available in Mono-enabled Redot builds.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [C# documentation index](../tutorials/scripting/c_sharp/index.md)
